qas.question: Where did Agassiz study during the 1840s?
Agassiz found that the Unteraar Glacier moved how much per year?
The movement of the Unteraar Glacier moved more rapidly in what part?

context: Agassiz studied glacier movement in the 1840s at <a0_0>the Unteraar Glacier<a0_0/> where he found the glacier moved <a1_0>100 m (328 ft)<a1_0/> per year, more rapidly in <a2_0>the middle<a2_0/> than at the edges. His work was continued by other scientists and now a permanent laboratory exists inside a glacier under the Jungfraujoch, devoted exclusively to the study of Alpine glaciers.
